data.text:
As a mark of respect for Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II during her State Funeral, we have reduced our schedule & re-timed some flights at Heathrow to ensure the skies are quiet at certain moments on Monday September 19th.
Click here for further details: https://t.co/H2Zr9Lrete https://t.co/BTcmG01x93

— Gusts of wind are forecast to subside, but a Yellow Weather Warning for wind remains in effect, the Met Office reports
— At least three people were killed during Storm Eunice due to falling and flying debris, while five others died elsewhere across Europe, BBC reports
